statements: SELECT * FROM electricity_consumption_data WHERE appliance_name = 'Fridge';
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumed FROM electricity_consumption_data WHERE power_consumed > 100;
SELECT appliance_name, power_consumed FROM electricity_consumption_data ORDER BY power_consumed DESC;
SELECT SUM(power_consumed) AS total_power_consumed FROM electricity_consumption_data;
SELECT MAX(power_consumed) AS max_power_consumed FROM electricity_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM electricity_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC, power_consumed DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT appliance_name, SUM(power_consumed) AS total_power_consumed FROM electricity_consumption_data GROUP BY appliance_name ORDER BY total_power_consumed DESC
SELECT appliance_name, date, time FROM electricity_consumption_data WHERE power_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC
SELECT AVG(power_consumed) AS average_power_consumed, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) AS month FROM electricity_consumption_data GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) ORDER BY month ASC
SELECT DISTINCT appliance_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM electricity_consumption_data GROUP BY appliance_name HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT * FROM appliance_data
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM appliance_data
SELECT appliance_name, date, time FROM appliance_data
SELECT * FROM appliance_data WHERE energy_consumed > 10
SELECT * FROM appliance_data ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT * FROM appliance_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM appliance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT appliance_name, category FROM appliance_types JOIN appliance_data ON appliance_types.appliance_name = appliance_data.appliance_name WHERE appliance_types.category = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY appliance_name;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM appliance_data WHERE energy_consumed < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT appliance_name AS name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM appliance_data GROUP BY appliance_name HAVING total_energy > 500 ORDER BY total_energy DESC;
SELECT * FROM ApplianceConsumption;
SELECT appliance_name, wattage FROM ApplianceConsumption ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(wattage) AS total_wattage FROM ApplianceConsumption;
SELECT appliance_name, daily_usage FROM ApplianceConsumption WHERE daily_usage > 5;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern FROM UsagePatterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ApplianceConsumption ORDER BY appliance_name DESC, wattage ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT appliance_name, wattage, daily_usage FROM ApplianceConsumption WHERE wattage > 1000 AND daily_usage < 5 ORDER BY daily_usage DESC;
SELECT AC.appliance_name, DC.total_consumption FROM ApplianceConsumption AC JOIN DailyConsumption DC ON AC.appliance_id = DC.appliance_id WHERE DC.date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT AC.appliance_name, UP.pattern FROM ApplianceConsumption AC JOIN UsagePatterns UP ON AC.appliance_id = UP.appliance_id WHERE UP.pattern = 'Regular Use';

SELECT DISTINCT AC.appliance_name, SUM(DC.total_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM ApplianceConsumption AC JOIN DailyConsumption DC ON AC.appliance_id = DC.appliance_id GROUP BY AC.appliance_name HAVING total_consumption > 50 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM appliance_energy_consumption;
SELECT appliance_name, category FROM appliance_details;
SELECT appliance_id, date, energy_consumed FROM appliance_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT category, energy_rating FROM appliance_details WHERE category = 'Kitchen';
SELECT report_date, total_energy_consumed, peak_usage_time FROM daily_energy_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appliance_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT appliance_name, category, energy_rating FROM appliance_details WHERE category = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY appliance_name;
SELECT appliance_id, on_time, off_time FROM appliance_schedule WHERE on_time < '12:00:00' ORDER BY off_time DESC;
SELECT report_date, total_energy_consumed FROM daily_energy_report WHERE total_energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM appliance_details ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM ApplianceConsumption;
SELECT appliance_name, consumption_kWh FROM ApplianceConsumption WHERE date_consumed = '2021-09-15';
SELECT * FROM RoomAppliance ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT room_name FROM Room WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, email FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ApplianceConsumption ORDER BY date_consumed DESC, consumption_kWh ASC

SELECT type_name, SUM(consumption_kWh) AS total_consumption FROM ApplianceConsumption JOIN RoomAppliance ON ApplianceConsumption.appliance_id = RoomAppliance.appliance_id JOIN ApplianceType ON RoomAppliance.room_id = ApplianceType.type_id GROUP BY type_name
SELECT appliance_name, consumption_kWh, date_consumed FROM ApplianceConsumption WHERE date_consumed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT u.user_name, r.room_name, ac.consumption_kWh FROM User u JOIN Room r ON u.user_id = r.room_id JOIN RoomAppliance ra ON r.room_id = ra.room_id JOIN ApplianceConsumption ac ON ra.appliance_id = ac.appliance_id ORDER BY u.user_name ASC

SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(ra.appliance_id) AS appliance_count FROM User u JOIN Room r ON u.user_id = r.room_id JOIN RoomAppliance ra ON r.room_id = ra.room_id GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING appliance_count > 2
